title: Pixel 3XL random reboots but only in one location
content:
My 3XL will run happily all day at home or at work, but whenever I'm in the city centre (Edinburgh) it will reboot. Sometimes can do this twice in a row. 
Once away from this location it will behave again.
Phone can be in my pocket doing nothing, playing music or in the middle of reading something when the reboot occurs.
Am puzzled ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”
